Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class Cli

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ViewObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.Cli
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class Cli
extends ViewObservable
implements View
This class contains the Command Line Interface handlers and actions.
